items.title: Health Professionals Condemn HHS Firing of ACIP Members
items.description: HHS Secretary provides no evidence of his allegations that the ACIP members are too conflicted to serve. Medscape Medical News

items.title: Research Links Affluence to Higher Scarring Alopecia Risk
items.description: Frontal fibrosing alopecia is more common among patients from affluent zip codes. Medscape Medical News

items.title: New Guidelines Shift Diabetes Care Toward Behavior
items.description: The recommendations focus on helping patients implement lifestyle changes. Medscape Medical News
